dir-entry.dir-entry-name: President of the Republic

dir-section.heading: Government
dir-section.p: A coalition comprising representatives of the Hrvatska Demokratska Zajednica (HDZ—Croatian Democratic Union), the Domovinski Pokret (DP—Homeland Movement) and independents.
